validated_idea.tagline: Professional-grade EVP investigation tool for serious paranormal researchers
validated_idea.one_liner: Turn your phone into a field-grade EVP analyzer with waveform visualization, anomaly detection, and investigation logging
validated_idea.problem_statement: Paranormal investigators and hobbyists lack credible, professional-grade mobile tools. Existing ghost hunting apps are novelty-focused, gimmicky, or lack real audio analysis capabilities. Serious researchers want signal over noise—actual waveform analysis, frequency visualization, and systematic investigation logging rather than entertainment features.
validated_idea.solution_summary: A calm, technical EVP investigation app that captures ambient audio sessions, analyzes recordings for frequency anomalies and patterns, provides waveform and spectrogram visualization, and helps users review, tag, and log their investigations without sensationalism.

target_user.primary: Paranormal investigators and hobbyists aged 25-55 who take their investigations seriously
target_user.secondary: Urban explorers, content creators, and enthusiasts who want credible-looking investigation tools
target_user.psychographic: Values authenticity over gimmicks, prefers analytical tools, interested in the methodical side of paranormal research

competitive_landscape.name: GhostTube EVP
competitive_landscape.positioning: Popular investigation tool with sensor integration

competitive_landscape.name: Ghost Hunting Tools
competitive_landscape.positioning: Multi-tool suite with EMF, EVP, word generator
competitive_landscape.gap: Toolkit approach, novelty features mixed with serious tools

market_analysis.differentiation: Professional aesthetic and analytical depth—this is field equipment, not a haunted house toy. Focus on waveform/spectrogram visualization, anomaly detection algorithms, and systematic investigation logging.
market_analysis.market_size: Niche but passionate audience. Paranormal investigation apps see millions of downloads. Top apps have 100K-500K active users.
market_analysis.subscription_viability: High. Users willing to pay $3.99-7.99/month for professional tools. One-time purchases of $5.99 common in category.

core_features.description: Noise-aware audio recording optimized for ambient capture in quiet environments
Real-time and post-recording waveform visualization with timeline scrubbing
Frequency domain visualization to identify patterns and anomalies
Automatic event markers for frequency spikes, noise floor changes, and silence anomalies
Session history with location, date, notes, and tagged clips
Scrub timeline, replay isolated clips, add interpretations and notes
Export clips as audio files for sharing or further analysis

technical_risks: Audio processing performance on older devices
technical_feasibility.mitigation: Use native audio processing libraries, optimize visualization frame rates, provide session duration limits

monetization_fit.free_tier: Basic recording, 3 saved sessions, waveform view only
monetization_fit.premium_tier: Unlimited sessions, spectrogram, anomaly detection, export, investigation log
monetization_fit.willingness_to_pay: High - serious hobbyists invest in equipment and tools
